resources.string: This section of the app allows for you the user to search for each selection of beer of your choosing. When you search for a beer selection it will offer the store where the beverages are located and you as a user can choose which one is closest to you. It will send you to google maps and give you the option to use google directions to guide you to the location.

This app is built for users to be able to find their beverage of choice. A user can create an account or use this app without an account. With the continuation of development with this app, more incentives will be designed for users with an account.
Breweries and distributors. Create an account and spread your product through the app which allows your consumers to find your drinks with ease.

Several updates to the app include bug fixes to prevent Crashes. Google Directions is working properly with the app, and text is added to all of the home Pages for each type of user. Unit Tests were created to help with optimization with the app. UI updates were also added. If there are any suggestions you wish to leave to improve this app, please let us know. at FindMyBeer@gmail.com

Welcome to the power user page. You are an employee of a company who has access to this page. To get started the Add Beer section allows you as a user to add your companies selection to the app. This will be updated in real time so that the selection will be visible to all users. You also have the option to delete products if you choose to not have it at certain locations.
If there are any suggestions you wish to leave to improve this app, please let us know. at FindMyBeer@gmail.com
